item.title: Build OpenCV 3.3 Android SDK on Mac OSX
item.description: By default, the official OpenCV Android SDK doesn’t contain the contrib libraries, like Aruco. Preposition NDK r10e https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r10e-darwin-x86_64.zip Android SDK Note: please degrade the Android SDK tools version, 25.2.4 is fine for me http://dl-ssl.google.com/android/repository/tools_r25.2.5-macosx.zip Go to ~/Library/Android/sdk, rename tools to tools.bak, then unzip the tools_rxxx.zip to sdk/tools directory. Why? because otherwise, android command has been deprecated) opencv 3.3.1 git clone https://github.com/opencv/opencv.git opencv_contrib git clone https://github.
